artist: Artist: Scott Gursky; Publisher: Socialist Scholars Conference
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, large text above a two-dimensional city skyline, with cross sections of buildings with small silhouettes of people gathering on the different floors; 24 pp.
title: Socialist Scholars Conference 2001
